title: Mass General Brigham Inter-Campus Shuttle Operations
description: Multi-campus shuttle transportation contract for Mass General Brigham health system. Covers inter-facility transport between 16+ locations including MGH, Brigham and Women's, Newton-Wellesley, and satellite clinics. Requires fleet of 15+ vehicles, GPS tracking, ADA compliance, and integration with hospital scheduling systems. 3-year base contract with 2 option years.
notes: Largest healthcare shuttle contract in MA. 3+2 year term. Requires significant fleet investment. High-value recurring revenue.

title: MassHealth NEMT Brokerage Services
agency: Massachusetts Executive Office of Health and Human Services
description: Non-emergency medical transportation brokerage services for MassHealth members. Includes scheduling, dispatching, and coordination of wheelchair van, stretcher, and ambulatory transport across all Massachusetts counties. Broker must maintain network of qualified NEMT providers.
keywords_matched: nemt; non-emergency medical; medical transport; wheelchair; stretcher; ambulatory; non-emergency; medical transportation; rfp; contract
notes: Large statewide contract. Check COMMBUYS for RFP updates. Previous contract held by regional broker.

title: Massport Logan Airport Hotel Shuttle Concession
description: Ground transportation concession for hotel and car rental shuttle services at Logan International Airport. Multi-route shuttle operations connecting terminals to airport hotels, rental car facilities, and employee parking areas. High-frequency service 18+ hours/day, 365 days/year.
keywords_matched: shuttle; airport; passenger; ground transportation; hotel shuttle; bid; contract
notes: Massport public bid. Airport concession contract with guaranteed passenger volume. TSA compliance required.

title: Harvard University Evening & Weekend Shuttle Operations
description: Evening and weekend shuttle operations for Harvard University covering Cambridge, Allston, and Longwood Medical Area campuses. Includes M2 shuttle route, evening van service, and special event transport. Fleet of 10+ vehicles required. GPS tracking and real-time arrival information mandatory.
keywords_matched: shuttle; transportation services; van service; fleet; event transport; contract
notes: Major university shuttle contract. Academic year focus. Competitive but high-value recurring revenue.

title: Boston University Campus Shuttle Operations Contract
description: Campus shuttle operations contract for Boston University connecting Charles River Campus, Medical Campus, and Fenway area. Includes BU Shuttle (Commonwealth Ave corridor), BU Medical Campus shuttle, and late-night safe ride service. Requires fleet of 12+ buses/shuttles with GPS tracking and real-time passenger information system.
notes: Large university contract. Academic year service with reduced summer schedule. Requires reliable fleet and dispatch systems.

title: MassDOT Highway Division - Emergency Vehicle Towing & Transport
description: Emergency and non-emergency vehicle towing, recovery, and transport services for MassDOT highway operations. Zone-based contract covering Massachusetts highway system. Includes disabled vehicle removal, accident clearance, and heavy-duty towing. 24/7 service required.
notes: State contract via COMMBUYS. Zone-based with multiple awards. Requires heavy-duty towing capability.

title: GATRA Demand-Response Paratransit Service Contract
agency: Greater Attleboro Taunton Regional Transit Authority (GATRA)
description: Demand-response paratransit and dial-a-ride transportation services for GATRA service area covering 28 communities in southeastern Massachusetts. Includes ADA paratransit, senior transport, and medical appointment trips. Estimated 500+ trips per week. Vehicle provision and driver staffing by contractor.
keywords_matched: paratransit; dial-a-ride; transportation services; transit; contract
notes: Regional transit authority contract. FTA-funded. DBE (Disadvantaged Business Enterprise) goals apply.

title: MWRTA Fixed-Route and Paratransit Operations
description: Fixed-route bus and demand-response paratransit service operations for MWRTA. Covers 16 MetroWest communities. Contractor provides vehicle operators, dispatch, and maintenance support. Approximately 400 fixed-route trips and 300 demand-response trips per week.
notes: Regional transit operations contract. FTA-funded with DBE goals. Good entry point for transit operators.

title: Tufts Medicine Patient Transport Network
agency: Tufts Medicine (Tufts Medical Center, Lowell General, MelroseWakefield)
description: Patient transport services connecting Tufts Medical Center (Boston), Lowell General Hospital, and MelroseWakefield Healthcare campuses. Includes scheduled inter-facility transfers, dialysis transport, and outpatient appointment shuttles. Wheelchair and stretcher service required.
notes: Multi-hospital system. Strong demand for wheelchair and stretcher transport between Boston and suburban campuses.

title: Boston Convention & Exhibition Center Event Shuttle Contract
description: Shuttle and ground transportation services for conventions and events at BCEC (Seaport), Hynes Convention Center (Back Bay), and MassMutual Center (Springfield). Includes attendee shuttles between hotels and venues, VIP transport, and exhibit freight coordination. Task-order based with guaranteed minimum volume.

title: Northeastern University Campus Shuttle & Safe Ride
description: Campus shuttle and late-night safe ride service for Northeastern University. Routes connecting Huntington Ave campus, Columbus Ave residence halls, and Ruggles MBTA station. Includes day shuttle service and evening/weekend safe ride program. Fleet of 8+ vehicles.
notes: University shuttle contract. Academic year schedule with summer reduction.

title: Steward Health Care System - Multi-Facility Patient Transport
description: Patient transport and inter-facility shuttle services for Steward Health Care's Massachusetts hospitals including St. Elizabeth's (Brighton), Good Samaritan (Brockton), Holy Family (Methuen), and Norwood Hospital. description: Employee shuttle service contract for Biogen's Cambridge headquarters and Boston-area facilities. Routes connecting Biogen campus to MBTA stations, parking facilities, and satellite offices. Morning and evening peak service plus midday circulator. 5-6 shuttle vehicles required.

title: Elder Services of Merrimack Valley - Senior Transport Program
description: Senior transportation services for elderly and disabled residents of the Merrimack Valley region. Door-to-door transport to medical appointments, adult day programs, nutrition sites, and essential services. Title III-B and state-funded program. Approximately 150 trips per week.

title: Quest Diagnostics MA Specimen Courier Routes
description: Dedicated medical specimen courier routes for Quest Diagnostics across Greater Boston and Central Massachusetts. 15-20 daily pickup stops at physician offices, clinics, and hospitals with delivery to Quest processing labs. Routes operate Monday-Saturday. Seeking reliable courier operators with temperature-controlled transport capability.
